data.eml:eml: Revision of the Neotropical caddisfly genus Itauara Mueller, 1888 (Trichoptera, Glossosomatidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Robertson, Desiree R., Holzenthal, Ralph W. (2011): Revision of the Neotropical caddisfly genus Itauara Mueller, 1888 (Trichoptera, Glossosomatidae). ZooKeys 114: 41-100, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.114.1405, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.114.1405
